summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of PBX Platform Update completed. All 12 features tested successfully. Dark theme with gold headers and red CTAs applied across landing, pricing, how-it-works, business, roadmap, and onboarding pages. PHP pricing (₱499, ₱2,499) correctly displayed. New features (Recurring Transfers, 1% APY Interest, 15-min FX Rate Lock) visible throughout the app.

issues: Login page uses light theme (offWhite background) while all other pages use dark theme (neutral-950). This creates visual inconsistency.

landing_page.details: Dark theme with gold headers (amber-400), red CTAs (red-600). Features section shows: Recurring Transfers, Wallet & Yield (1% APY), 15-Min FX Rate Lock. PHP pricing preview (₱499/mo, ₱2,499/mo) visible.

pricing_page.details: PHP pricing correctly displayed - Basic: Free, Premium: ₱499/mo, SME: ₱2,499/mo, Enterprise: Custom. Feature comparison table shows PBX Wallet, Recurring Transfers, 1% APY Interest (Premium only), 15m FX Lock, Monthly Limits in PHP.

how_it_works_page.details: 4 steps displayed: 01-Create Account, 02-Fund Wallet, 03-Lock FX Rate (15 minutes), 04-Send & Track. Key Features section shows 15-Min Rate Lock, Earn 1% APY, Recurring Transfers.

business_page.details: For Business badge visible. Benefits: Save on FX, Recurring Transfers, Scalable Solutions, Dedicated Support. SME (₱2,499/mo) and Enterprise (Custom) plans with PHP pricing.

roadmap_page.details: Q1-Q4 2025 quarters with status badges (Done, In Progress, Planned). New features listed: 15-minute FX Rate Lock, 1% APY interest for Premium, Recurring Transfers.

onboarding_personal.details: 3-step flow with dark theme. Plan selection shows Basic (Free) and Premium (₱499/mo) with RECOMMENDED badge. 1% APY Interest highlighted for Premium.

onboarding_business.details: 4-step flow (Email → Plan → Company → Preferences). PHP pricing: SME ₱2,499/mo, Enterprise Custom. Recurring transfer scheduling option available.

fx_quote_simulator.details: Plan selector with all tiers (Basic, Premium, SME, Enterprise). 15-min countdown timer working. Rate lock indicator shows 'Rate Locked' with time remaining. Plan-based rates displayed.

dashboard.details: Wallet balance in PHP (₱50,000.00). Yield indicator for Premium users showing monthly interest (1% APY). FX Rate Locked In section with countdown timer. Send Money and Logout buttons functional.

dark_theme.details: Dark theme (bg-neutral-950) applied to landing, pricing, how-it-works, business, roadmap, onboarding pages. Gold headers (amber-400), red CTAs (red-600).

php_pricing.details: All pricing in PHP: Basic Free, Premium ₱499/mo, SME ₱2,499/mo, Enterprise Custom. Monthly limits in PHP (₱250,000, ₱1,250,000, ₱5,000,000, Unlimited).

new_features.details: Recurring Transfers, PBX Wallet with 1% APY interest (Premium only), 15-minute FX Rate Lock - all features visible and properly indicated throughout the app.

action_items: MINOR: Consider updating Login page (/login) to use dark theme for visual consistency with rest of app
critical_code_review_comments: All APIs are MOCKED - no backend integration. Session management uses sessionStorage only.
FX rates are simulated/hardcoded in FXQuoteSimulator.jsx component
Onboarding flows use setTimeout to simulate API calls
Login page uses different theme (light) compared to rest of app (dark)
test_credentials: No credentials needed - all flows are mocked for demo. Any email works for sandbox testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All PBX Platform Update features verified: Dark theme with gold/red colors, PHP pricing (₱499, ₱2,499), new features (Recurring Transfers, 1% APY Interest, 15-min FX Rate Lock). Login page has different theme (light) - minor inconsistency. All APIs are MOCKED.
